validations.description: Ensures that the ACCOUNT-NUMBER field is provided (not empty) before processing a transaction.
validations.condition: ACCOUNT-NUMBER is empty or not present
validations.failureOutcome: Processing is halted and an error message is displayed: ACCOUNT NUMBER MISSING

validations.description: Checks that the TRANSACTION-AMOUNT does not exceed the MAX-TRANSACTION-LIMIT value.
validations.failureOutcome: Transaction is rejected and error message AMOUNT EXCEEDS LIMIT is displayed.

validations.description: Ensures that the TRANSACTION-TYPE is either DEPOSIT or WITHDRAWAL.
validations.condition: TRANSACTION-TYPE is not DEPOSIT or WITHDRAWAL
validations.failureOutcome: Transaction is rejected and error message INVALID TRANSACTION TYPE is displayed.

validations.description: Validates that the USER-ID field is provided during login.
validations.failureOutcome: Login process is halted and error message USER ID REQUIRED is displayed.

validations.description: Requires PASSWORD to be provided and to be at least 8 characters.
validations.condition: PASSWORD is missing or PASSWORD length < 8
validations.failureOutcome: Login fails and error message INVALID PASSWORD is displayed.
